NG0509:6: sarba b+he la tri d+harma d+ha du /
NG0509:8: rang byung gis chos tshig thams cad drang shar ba'i glegs bam /
NG0509:9: bcom ldan 'das ka dag smra bsam brjod tshig mtha' dang bral ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
NG0509:10: chos kyi dbyings dmigs gtad dang bral ba'i klong na /
NG0509:11: mtshan ma yul gnyis dang bral ba'i gzhal yas bzo min kha dog dang bral ba'i gdan khri la /
NG0509:12: zhal phyag phyogs gzhan las 'das pa'i ston pa kun tu bzang pos /
NG0509:13: thugs rje sna tshogs su 'phrod pa'i rang shes rig gi mdangs dgrod la /
NG0509:14: 'khor 'das gnyis su mi phye phye ba mi mnga' ba'i dus su bka' stsal pa /
NG0509:16: stong khyab gsal rig bzod pa med //
NG0509:17: snang khyab lhug pa thal le ba //
NG0509:18: ming med yul bral ma 'gag cing *//
NG0509:20: rang rtsal ma rig gzhi snang 'thas //
NG0509:21: stong ngo rang bzhin gsal char zhen //
NG0509:23: khams gsum rigs drug dug gsum 'thungs //
NG0509:24: de grol kungs chen lta 'dod na //
NG0509:25: snang ba bkod pa'i phyi dbyings nang *//
NG0509:26: sku gsum rdzogs ldan tshom 'od zer //
NG0509:28: shel 'ja' me long nya phyis gsum //
NG0509:29: dbang bzhi rdzogs pa'i dpe ru bzhag / mun nag sgo gsum bya ba btang *//
NG0509:30: a 'a sha sa ma ha bzlas //
NG0509:31: rdo rje gdengs pa mi g.yo zhing *//
NG0509:32: 'byung bzhi phyi nang rtog rtsa bcad //
NG0509:33: gdod ma bzhi la ngang bab na //
NG0509:34: g.yo med klong du drug cu bsnal //
NG0509:35: sems dang ye shes rtsa lam sgo //
NG0509:36: so sor dbye la gcig tu bsre //
NG0509:37: chos sku rang grol phyag rgya'i //
NG0509:38: sgron ma rnam bzhi longs spyod cig / snang bzhi gdeng bzhi sa zin nas /
NG0509:39: khams gsum mig med ye rdzogs rgyas //
NG0509:40: snang dang stong dang dbyer med chos //
NG0509:42: rang byung sho log gnyis pa 'di //
NG0509:43: tshig dang yi ger ma byung ste //
NG0509:45: bstan pa kun gyis thog ma'o //
NG0509:47: rin po ches bris te mgul du bcangs pa'i mi ni dran sangs rgya ba'o //
NG0509:48: sngags kyi srungs mas bka' 'di srungs la /
NG0509:49: skal ldan gyi bu la gtod cig / s+ya s+ya s+ya /
